verbs.description: GRAND RAPIDS , Mich. -- Hospitals [V: may] soon have to be more transparent . A proposed rule by President Trump 's administration would require hospitals to post prices online . This would give patients an idea of the out of pocket costs they will face .

GRAND RAPIDS , Mich. -- Hospitals [ARGM-MOD: may] soon [V: have] to be more transparent . A proposed rule by President Trump 's administration would require hospitals to post prices online . This would give patients an idea of the out of pocket costs they will face .
